EnExplanation: The word 'oleks' is a conditional form of the verb 'olema' (to be) in Estonian, used to express hypothetical situations or possibilities.

Samples.EnSentence: That would be a good idea.

Samples.EeSentence: Mul oleks hea meel sind näha.
Samples.EnSentence: I would be happy to see you.

Samples.EeSentence: Ta oleks õnnelik, kui sa kutsud teda peole.
Samples.EnSentence: He would be happy if you invite him to the party.
